messages.title: James Willis for Dartford
messages.content: 4 Steps to a fairer Britain. 1. Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. 2. A fair chance for every child. 3. A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener. 4. A fair deal for you from the politicians.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pay no tax on the first £10,000 earnt - cutting most tax bills by £700.
Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolish university tuition fees.
Create jobs by making Britain greener with sustainable public transport and energy efficient homes.
Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.
The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services.
Put more police on patrol, restore the pensioners' earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces.
The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.

issues.education: Fight for families in the Borough for a fair access to schools. School places for Dartford children at Dartford schools.
issues.health: The NHS is at risk with the Conservatives. Tory health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns and stand up for what matters to you.

endorsements.endorsement: Lib Dems are driving force to stop toll 'rip off'

quotes.text: Lib Dems are driving force to stop toll 'rip off'

images.caption: James Willis and Lib Dem Shadow Chancellor Vince Cable

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains promises for Dartford such as stopping the toll 'rip off' for the Dartford crossing and ensuring fair access to schools.
